archimate:ArchimateModel.name: KU Leuven PAA 2406
archimate:ArchimateModel.purpose:
This Public Administration Architecture model is intended to be a starting point for developing an Enterprise Architecture for any Public Administration. The model is published by the Public Governance Institute of KU Leuven ( https://soc.kuleuven.be/io/english )
KU Leuven ( https://www.kuleuven.be ) developed this PAA model in close cooperation with the Belgian Federal Organisation for Digital Transformation ( https://dt.bosa.be/en ), that is part of the Belgian Federal Public Service for Policy and Support ( https://www.bosa.be ).
License and copyright information.
This model is released to the public under a license : Creative Commons — Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/
Parts of the PAA are based upon the use of Architectural Building Blocks (ABB) from the European Interoperability Reference Architecture (EIRA) https://joinup.ec.europa.eu/collection/european-interoperability-reference-architecture-eira/solution/eira and are protected by the ISA product license https://joinup.ec.europa.eu/collection/european-interoperability-reference-architecture-eira/solution/eira/distribution/isa-product-license-v14 which also covers the use of Archi and the Archimate language that were used to create PAA.
The (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) license grants the right to any Public Administration in the EU to use the PAA model for modelling the EA of Public Administrations by referring to KU Leuven as the original author of the model and providing feedback about any proposed improvements of the model to KU Leuven.
Note: 1) If you are viewing the HTML version of this model, click open the "Views" menu element on the left to start your navigation. 2) If you received or downloaded the HTML version of this model as a zip archive, first unzip it. The html version can not be navigated from within the zip archive.
​
